text: a yi a fala a xa, a naxa, “Banxin sogetede binna foye soden nabi.” A yi a rabi. Elise yi a fala a xa, a naxa, “A woli.” A yi a woli. Elise yi a fala a xa, a naxa, “Xunba xalimakunla ni ito ra Alatala mabinni, xunba xalimakunla na a ra Arami kaane xili ma, i Arami kaane nɔma nɛn Afeki yi han i yi e raxɔri.”
